page.title: 04A Woman's Day
page.content: The unit in which I work is part of Weare School.During the day I work with children from all the classes in the main school. I hear some children read and others I help with their writing.Sometimes I help the teacher in the classroom. At 3:30p.m.I leave school and go to the supermarket in Cheddar to do some shopping.By the time I get home it is 4:30p.m.and time to wake my husband.He is a policeman who often works at night and so must sleep in the daytime.I make the supper which is usually meat,potatoes,and vegetables and collect Jackie from Axbridge.After supper I finish any housework.I hoover the carpets and wash the clothes.Later I go and help the Brownies work for their badges.I enjoy playing games with them too.At 10:30p.m. I go to bed to be ready for the next day.
